description: The notification is generated when the rate of the bandwidth for the
interface exceeds the upper limit.

event.Summary: Bandwidth rate $v2 exceeded the upper limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfBandwidthUsageHigh IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfBandwidthRate i 0 HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfBandwidthUpperLimit i 1

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The rate of the bandwidth for an interface.
variables.name: HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfBandwidthRate

description: The rate of the bandwidth upper limit for an interface.
variables.name: HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfBandwidthUpperLimit

description: The notification is generated when the rate of the discarded packets
for the interface exceeds the upper limit.

event.Summary: Discarded packets rate $v2 exceeded the upper limit $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfDiscardPktRateHigh IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfDiscardPktRate i 0 HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfDiscardPktRateUpperLimit i 1

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The rate of the discarded packets for an interface.
variables.name: HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfDiscardPktRate

description: The rate of the discarded packets upper limit for an interface.
variables.name: HH3C-IF-EXT-MIB::hh3cIfDiscardPktRateUpperLimit

description: The notification is generated when the interface is suppressed
via dampening.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The notification is generated when the interface is resumed to
not suppressed via dampening.

event.Summary: Interface is not suppressed via dampening

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr
